ing: 2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed
1 tablespoon curry powder, or to taste
1 (8 ounce) package tempeh, cut into cubes
5 small corn tortillas, cut into small triangles
des: "Excellent recipe to introduce kale, tempeh, and healthy foods to family and friends. My family loves it!"
ins: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat; add kale and curry powder. Cook and stir kale mixture in the hot oil until wilted, about 5 minutes. Add avocados, tempeh, and tortillas; cook and stir until dry, golden brown, and crunchy, 30 to 40 minutes.
